_header: Thou cruel Herod thou mortal enemy
_description: A version of the hymn, ‘Hostis herode impie’ — five stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Thow cruell herode thow martall enemyeOf criste whi art þow
                    ferd whi dost thow drede…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…We wyrshyp the fadyr of mightes mostCriste hys sone and eke
                    the holy gost. Amene
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 460-2.
